title: Someone is trying to access my account
body: So someone has been spamming the forgotten username and password the past week and at one point managed to change the password of my account, luckily I didn't lose access to my email so I changed it to something else quickly and have also changed my email password. I asked a friend and he said I should message support but I do not know what it would go under as well as how to stop this. I'm not really sure what to do as this has never happened before and I'm hoping a mod will see this to possibly help me. Any ideas from you guys?

replies.body: Go ahead and hit up our account team by picking the option "I need help recovering my account" in your [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). That will make sure it goes to the right team, and they should be able to help you out with making sure your account is safe.
